data.title: Émile Loubet – Hungarian National Gallery
data.text:
Monday the permanent exhibition is open 10 am – 6 pm,

Tuesday – Sunday open

10 am – 6 pm

Closing of exhibitions starts at 5.30 pm at the top floor;

Ticket office: until 5.00 pm

Entry is allowed until 5.00 pm – also with pre-purchased or free tickets.

Look at our annual opening hours

MúzeumShop (without entrance ticket as well):

Monday-Sunday open 10 am – 5.45 pm

Museum Café:

Monday – Sunday open 10 am – 5.45 pm
